summary.label:
Has it ever happened that you have to meet someone and the person can't explain where he/she is? This app will quickly find the location of another phone by sending a text message request. Most phones manufactured after 2010 can accept this request, no need to install any additional app on the 2nd person's phone. It does not get any easier than this!

How it is working:

• User A wants to know a User B location.

• User A enters the phone number of User B into the app.

• The app generates a unique URL, and the URL is sent to User B.

• If User B clicks on the link, user A will see the location of user B.

Limitations:

• This is not a spy app. User B must agree to share the location with you.

• If User B has a device without GPS (desktop computer, tablet), the determined location may have a large accuracy margin (up to 5 km).

• In rare situations, when user B is behind the corporate proxy, the app can show the proxy's location, not the user's.

The user location is determined in three ways:

• E.123, E.164
• RIR
• W3C Geolocation API

> Get latest updated location of your family member
> Easy access to get authenticate Scan QR / User ID to track location

> Your current location and place finder

HOW TO USE THIS APP?

To easy understanding consider you as a FATHER and you want to track your daughter’s current location.

1. Download and create your own account and login. (Required information: Name, Email ID, Password, Profile Picture).

2. Start Tracking your daughter with entering her User ID / scan her QR. (Your daughter must have this app and need to login with her credentials, She can also deny you to access her location by removing you from her whitelist).

NOTE that, If your daughter able to check that who are accessing her location and she can also able to deny those members.

QUESTIONS:
1. What type of information will you get after accepting a request?
Ans: After accepting request, FATHER(Consider above example to understand) will get,
His daughter is ideal or moving. If moving then what is her speed, Her Exact Location, Timestamp, Device name from where her daughter accessing/Logged in this app, Heading, Accuracy of location, and altitude.

2. How many members can I include for tracking?
Ans: You can track 2 members for FREE and then you need to buy package as per member requirements. Currently 3 pack is available  for 5/7/10 member track request in minimum cost.  

3. How to use it? 
You need to create your own account and share your QR / User Id to whom you allow to track access your location. Same way you need to scan QR / user Id of your family members to get access of their latest location.

4. How to get my UserId / QR?
Login with your account > Go to Profile Screen > Go To 'Your QR' Screen. Here is your own QR and user Id below it. You can Copy user Id OR save QR to local storage also.

5. How To track my family member?
Install this app to all device you want to track and create individual login credentials.
